description: Example conversation showing a prompt injection attack on the ComplianceWatchdog assistant, where an attacker uses hexadecimal obfuscation and newline escape sequences to force the assistant to retrieve confidential internal policy excerpts and audit‑log summaries and return them to the attacker.
